summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 TOYOTA CAMRY. THE CONTACT WAS DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 35 MPH, PROCEEDING TO A TRAFFIC LIGHT. WHEN PRESSURE WAS APPLIED TO THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL THE VEHICLE SLIGHTLY SURGED FORWARD IN A JERKING MOTION. THE ROAD AND WEATHER CONDITIONS WERE NORMAL. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN AUTHORIZED DEALER FOR DIAGNOSTIC TESTING. THE TECHNICIAN WAS UNABLE TO DUPLICATE THE FAILURE. THE VEHICLE WAS PREVIOUSLY REPAIRED PER  NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 10V017000 (VEHICLE SPEED CONTROL: ACCELERATOR PEDAL). THE RECALL REMEDY DID NOT CORRECT THE RECURRING DEFECT. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 17,000. THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 17,400.  UPDATED 04/15/10. *LJ  UPDATED 05/06/10*JB
